entities.description: The sequence number of arrestees as recorded in the survey.
The unweighted frequency of occurrences for each arrestee sequence number.
The percentage of occurrences for each arrestee sequence number.
The number of valid cases used in the calculation.
The total number of cases considered in the survey.
Statistical measures such as Mean, Median, Mode, Minimum, Maximum, and Standard Deviation for the variable.
Location details of the variable with width and decimal information.
Type and range of missing values for the variable.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted frequency for each arrestee sequence number.
Indicates the percentage of occurrences for each arrestee sequence number.
Provides statistical measures for the arrestee sequence number variable.
Specifies the location details for the arrestee sequence number variable.
Defines the type and range of missing values for the arrestee sequence number variable.
Statistics are calculated based on the number of valid cases.
Statistics are calculated based on the total number of cases considered.
